CodeList.Name: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for my child to breathe.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard to Breathe

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: My child gets sick easily.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Get Sick Easily

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: My child gets sores and/or rashes.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Get Sores and/or Rashes

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: My child's legs hurt.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Legs Hurt

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: My child feels tired.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Feel Tired

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: My child's back feels stiff.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Back Feels Stiff

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: My child wakes up tired.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Wake Up Tired

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: My child's hands are weak.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hands Are Weak

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for my child to use the bathroom.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard to Use Bathroom

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for my child to gain or lose weight when he or she wants to.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard to Gain or Lose Weight

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for my child to use his or her hands.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard to Use Hands

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for my child to swallow food.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard to Swallow Food

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It takes my child a long time to bathe or shower.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Long Time to Bathe or Shower

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: My child gets hurt accidentally.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Get Hurt Accidentally

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: My child takes a long time to eat.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Take Long Time to Eat

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for my child to turn him or herself during the night.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard to Turn During Night

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PQL13-Hard to Go Places With Equipment
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for my child to go places with his or her equipment.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard to Go Places With Equipment

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for my child to tell the doctors and nurses how he or she feels.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard Tell Doctors and Nurses How Feel

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for my child to ask the doctors and nurses questions.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard Ask Doctors and Nurses Questions

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for my child to explain his or her illness to other people.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard Explain Illness to People

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PQL13-Hard for Family to Plan Activities
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for our family to plan activities like vacations.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard for Family to Plan Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: It is hard for our family to get enough rest.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Hard for Family to Rest

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: I think money is a problem in our family.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Money Problem in Our Family

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: I think our family has a lot of problems.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Family Has Lot of Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3 Teen Parent Report - In the past 7 days, how much of a problem has this been for your teen: My child does not have the equipment he or she needs.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Acute Version 3.0 Parent Report for Teen - Do Not Have Equipment Need
